Company Short Description: GMR, or as we say - Gamer, is a tech startup headquartered in Manchester and with remote teams based in the EU, South-East Asia and North America. We are building applications with cutting edge Web3 and blockchain technology that will revolutionise the gaming world.
personalized_line: As GMR works to revolutionize the gaming industry with blockchain technology, the challenge of cutting through the noise with conventional marketing approaches is likely top of mind.
